summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5641 for the improvement of The Alley as platted in Block 1, Wild Rose Addition, being the alley between 8th Avenue West and 7th Avenue West, from West McGraw Street to West Wheeler Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 74401, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
